title: 507. 103 Pieces of Advice That May or May Not Work
description: Kevin Kelly calls himself “the most optimistic person in the world.” And he has a lot to say about parenting, travel, A.I., being luckier — and why we should spend way more time on YouTube.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
